display_long_description:
Dear users,

Unfortunately, we will stop selling the app on the store by 31.12.2025. 

If you have purchased the app, you will of course be able to use the app after that date. 

But please note that, the multiplayer mode will be supported till 30.6.2026, after that date PvP will be deactivated and can’t be used any longer. 

We’d like to thank all users for their trust in our app and we hope you will continue to enjoy the app in single player mode. 

---

Are you ready? Then step into the family-friendly world of Timo Boll VR Table Tennis, where reality meets virtual excitement.

Play with the legendary table tennis icon, Timo Boll and beam Timo right into your  garden (keep an eye on your dog 😉), garage or your training center with our mixed reality mode.

Challenge photorealistic AI opponents including a robot. 

You can also step in for a training session with Timo "Magic" Boll in this ultra-realistic looking VR experience. 

Whether you’re in for casual fun or aiming to learn from the legend, Timo Boll VR Table Tennis has something for everyone. 

- Casual Fun: Go for some free hitting with the legend himself. Hit-assistance will support your game and Timo will adapt to your skills. 

- Campaign Mode: Experience the excitement of arcade table tennis with lifelike AI opponents and a robot in the campaign mode.

- Train With A Legend: Timo Boll VR Table Tennis offers new immersive training opportunities. 

- Multiplayer: Are you into competition? Challenge your friends!
